articles.description: Sony has launched the WH-CH710N wireless noise cancelling headphones in India, priced at Rs. 9,990. The headphones are the successor to the excellent WH-CH700N and promise similarly good battery life.
articles.content: Sony WH-CH710N wireless active noise cancelling headphones have been launched in India, priced at Rs. 9,990. The affordable wireless noise cancelling headphones were launched in April globally for $2… [+1938 chars]

articles.title: TCL to Launch 8K Smart QLED TV in India on 18 June - Beebom
articles.description: TCL is all set to launch an 8K Smart QLED TV in India. The event is scheduled to be held on the 18th of June at 12.30 PM.
